account_id.description: Microsoft account ID where the event will be created.

end.description: End time in ISO-8601 format; must be after start.

location.description: Optional location display name for the event.

body.description: Optional plain text body or description.

oneOf.description: List of attendee email addresses (duplicates removed automatically).

attendees.description: Attendee email address or array of addresses; limited to 500 unique entries.

timezone.description: IANA timezone identifier applied to start/end values (default UTC).
